column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Tepelene
#Text=Tepelenë is in Southeastern Albania .
#Text=This district has two cities : Tepelene and Memaliaj , and a lot of villages .
#Text=This district includes " Kurvelesh " , a region famous for its bravery and polyphonic characteristic songs .
#Text=This region has 15 villages , which are : Gusmari , Vërmiku , Nivica , Rexhini , Progonati , Lekdushi , Golemi , Kaparieli , Picari , Kolonja , Kuç , Bolenë , Kallarat , Fterrë and Çorraj .
#Text=By car
#Text=From Tirana , you can get to Tepelene following the itinerary Tirana-Durres-Rrogozhine-Lushnje-Fier-Levan-Tepelene ( 3-3½ hr ) .
#Text=The roadway is new and has good quality .
#Text=From Greece , you can go through Kakavije-Gjirokaster-Tepelene ( 1 hr-1 hr 20 min ) .
#Text=From Kosovo , you follow : Morine-Kalimash-Rreshen-Milot-Fushe Kruje-Durres-Rrogozhine-Lushnje- ( from Milot , 5-6 hr )
#Text=From Macedonia , you follow Qafe Thane-Librazhd-Elbasan-Rrogozhine-Lushnje-Fier-Tepelene ( 3-3½ hr from Qafe Thane ) .
#Text=From Montenegro , you can follow Muriqan-Shkodra-Lezhe-Fushe Kruje-Milot-Durres-Lushnje-Fier-Levan-Tepelene ( 5-5½ hr from Muriqan ) .
#Text=By plane
#Text=You can come also through Rinas Airport ( in Tirana )
#Text=If you come with a plane , you can ( i ) rent a car ( this is the most preferred and the prices are lower than in other parts of Europe ) .
#Text=By bus
#Text=Take the bus in Tirana at the crossroad between Kavaja Street with Unaza e Re .
#Text=It costs around 700 lek , or € 5 .
#Text=Ask the driver to leave you in Tepelene .
#Text=With a taxi : Find a taxi with a good car in Tirana , and ask the driver if he speaks a foreign language .

#Text=If you ca n't find a driver that speaks a language you know , kindly someone that is walking near you at that moment to translate ( find a young boy or girl , as they speak foreign languages better ) .
#Text=Through your translator , tell the taxier to send you to Tepelene , and negotiate the price beforehand ?
#Text=By sea
#Text=Take the boat to Vlora or Durres , then go to Tepelene ( through Vlore-Kuc-Tepelene or Durres-Rrogozhine-Lushnje-Fier-Levan-Tepelene )
#Text=See
#Text=Castle remains of Tepelene ( Kështjella e Tepelenës ) .
#Text=Church of Tepelene , Rruga Ali Pashe Tepelena .
#Text=There are a lot of things to be seen in Tepelene .
#Text=Do
#Text=Walk around Kurveleshi .
#Text=Ask for a guesthouse to the local tourist information office and enjoy the well-known hospitality .
#Text=Peshtura waterfall ( Ujëvara e Peshturës ) , in Progonat ( SW 13 km ) .
#Text=Uji waterfall ( Uji i Ftohte ) , E-853 road ( SE 8 km ) .
#Text=Doshnica waterfall ( Ujëvara e Doshnicës )
#Text=Cave of Lek Peta , Progonat Village ( SW 12 km ) .
#Text=Dragoti Cave .
#Text=Water 's Mom Cave .
#Text=Zemren e Shendelis .
#Text=Lekdushi Springs .
#Text=Nivia Canyons .
#Text=Këlcyrë Gorge ( Albanian : Gryka e Këlcyrës ) ( E 25 km ) .
#Text=This is also breathtaking and memorable place , created by the river Vjosë .
#Text=Visit the Ortodox Monastery ( Manastiri Ortodoks Gryka e Këlcyrës ) .
#Text=Hole of Feuds ( Pusi i Hasmerive ) .
#Text=One of the most interesting things to visit in this region .
#Text=The legend says that in ancient times , the people killed for " feuds " ( see Blood Feud in Albania ) were buried there .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Postcards , handmade bags or clothes .
#Text=Eat
#Text=White cheese and wine .
#Text=Drink
#Text=Tepelena Water .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Hotel Veal - ( 600m from the center )
#Text=Hotel Veal has a garden , bar , terrace , and free WiFi .
#Text=All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV
#Text=Hotel Auto Grill Roberti - ( 2.6 km from center )
#Text=Located in Tepelenë , Hotel Auto Grill Roberti features a garden , a bar and a terrace
#Text=Guesthouse Lord Byron - ( 1.1km from the center )
#Text=Guesthouse Lord Byron features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool , garden , a fitness centre and bar in Tepelenë .
#Text=Go next
#Text=Përmet
#Text=Fier
#Text=Gjirokastër
